Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute at Lake Shore Drive/44th
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temp. rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/44th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/44th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temp. rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, and Lake Shore Drive near Lake Shore Drive/44th.

Headline: Linden-bound Purple and Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple and Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple and Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
